data.title: Timetables
data.text:
To allow for road works on Tuesday 27th August 20:00 until Wednesday 28th August 06:00 M8 J27 off slip East Bound will be closed.

During the closure the following diversion will be in operation:

Service 77 towards Buchanan Bus Station

White Cart Road at Sanderling Road, Sanderling Road, Inchinnan Road, Love Street, Niddry Street, Renfrew Road and Renfrew Road

Service 500 to Glasgow Airport.

To allow for road works on Tuesday 27th August from 20:00 until Wednesday 28th August 06:00 M8 junction 28 west Bound off slip will be closed to Glasgow Airport.

During the closure the following diversions will be in operation:

Service 500 towards Glasgow Airport:

M8 to Junction 29 West Bound to St James interchange rejoin M8 junction 29 East Bound to Glasgow Airport

To allow for motorway works on Monday 26th August until Wednesday 28th August M8 J15 off slip West Bound for Stirling Road will be closed from 20:00 until 06:00 each night.

During the closure the following diversions will be in operation:

Services X3, X85, X87 towards Buchanan Bus Station:

Normal route M8 J15, continue and take exit 16 A81 George Square, Canal Street, Dobbies Loan, North Hanover Street, Killermont Street to Buchanan Bus Station.

To allow for works on Sunday the 1st of September, George Square South will be closed until 12:00.

During the closure the following diversion will be in operation:

Services 6A, 41 & 500 towards St Vincent Place

Normal Route, Montrose Street at Cochrane Street continue on Montrose Street, Ingram Street, Queen Street & St Vincent Place.

Services 6, 18, 240, 255, 263 & 267 towards St Vincent Place

Normal route Ingram Street at South Frederick Street continue Ingram Street, Queen Street & St Vincent Place.

Service 21 towards East Kilbride Gardenhall

From Cochrane Street, South Frederick Street, Ingram Street, Queen Street & St Vincent Place.

To allow for an event on Sunday 1st September from 04:00hrs until 20:00hrs, Cowgate & West High Street will close.

During the closure all stops will be observed and the following diversions will be in operation:

Service X85 towards Campsie Glen

Normal route Cowgate at Catherine Street, Catherine Street, New Lairdsland Road & Glasgow Road.

Service X87 towards Waterside

Normal route Cowgate at Catherine Street, Catherine Street, New Lairdsland Road, & High Street.

Service 88 88A towards Harestanes

Normal route Cowgate at Catherine Street, Catherine Street & New Lairdsland Road normal route.

Service 89 89A 88C towards Kilsyth/Campsie Glen

Normal route to Glasgow Road at West High Street,1st exit on the roundabout Glasgow Road, New Lairdsland Road, Industry Street, Townhead, Cowgate, & Catherine Street.

Service 89 89A 88C towards Buchanan Bus Station

Normal route to Catherine Street at Cowgate, Townhead, Industry Street, 1st exit on the roundabout New Lairdsland Road & Glasgow Road.

To allow for Carriageway works on Friday 30th August from 08:30 until 17:00 Carntyne Road will be closed between Cardowan Road and Ruchazie Road.

During the closure all stops will be observed and the following diversions will be in operation:

Service 43 towards Parkhead.

Normal route Carntyne Road at Cardowan Road, left Cardowan Road, right Carntynehall Road, 1st exit at roundabout Carntyne Road normal route.

Service 43 towards Fort.

Normal route Carntyne Road at Carntynehall roundabout and take 3rd exit onto Carntynehall Road, left Cardowan Road, right Carntyne Road normal route.

Under no circumstances should any services operate under Carntynehall road Bridge

To allow for road works on Saturday 24th August 08:00 until Sunday 25th August 17:00 Pitt Street will be closed at St Vincent Street.

During the closure all stops will be observed and the following diversions will be in operation:

Service 2 towards Baillieston.

Normal route St Vincent Street at Newton Street, right Newton Street, left Argyle Street, right West George Street normal route.

Service 6/6A

To allow for resurfacing on Tuesday 27th August 09:00 until Thursday 29th August 18:00 Great Western Road will be closed East Bound.

During the closure all stops will be observed and the following diversions will be in operation:

Towards City.

Normal route, Great Western Road at Dorchester Avenue, left Dorchester Avenue through Mini roundabout continue Dorchester Avenue, right Cleveden Road, through mini roundabout Cleveden Road, through next set of mini-roundabouts Cleveden Road, left Great Western Road via normal route.
